name: Tiny Horde
description:
In Tiny Horde, you lead a swarm of rats storming a tavern. The more food you collect, the stronger the swarm grows and the more obstacles you can overcome.

Proceed with caution, as the owner is known to use rat poison... And grow strong enough to break down the final door !

This game was made for the 2021.1 Brackeys Game Jam, according to the theme Stronger Together.

Our team :

Yann Kukolewsky  "Galgen" : 2D Artist
Guillaume D'arcy-Orga : Sound Designer / Composer
Chloé Morel "Jezzos" : 3D Artist
Rudy Michel  "Xiff" : 3D Artist
Antoine Brousse "ItsMeTwn" : Game design / Level Design
Seb Gm  "Mahjoub" : Programmer
Sylve Renault "oxy" : Game Design / Programmer
